name: Outside the Lines (itch)
description:
My name is Cade (or AstroPenguin642) and I live in the United States. I'm 16 years old and I've been making games since I was seven. The Pre-Indie Game Jam seemed like the perfect game to enter, considering it was designed for students and adults alike. I did the programming for Outside the Lines.

CatnipOverdose prefers not to share his name, but he's a very good friend of mine from Australia.  He's 17 years old, and we've been working on projects together for a couple of years. He did the artwork for Outside the Lines.

Additional Credits

The music was automatically generated using a cool website called https://www.jukedeck.com/ and the sounds are originally from https://freesound.org/ but I edited them.
